doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.num: Kumastheru Liyange Sumudu Chinthaka Vs Bandula Jayasinghe Commissioner General of Lands, Land Commissioner General’s Department,
latest_doc_d.description: WRT/576/24 before Hon. Adithya Patabendige, J.
latest_doc_d.keywords: Writ of Certiorari, Writ of Mandamus, Succession under the Land Development Ordinance, Applicability of Rule 1 of the Third Schedule of the Land Development Ordinance, Amendment Act No.11 of 2022.
latest_doc_d.legistation: Article 140 of the Constitution, Land Development Ordinance, Land
